data.name: BCG
data.description: The Bacille Calmette-Guerin (BCG) vaccine protects against childhhod Tuberculosis.

data.name: PENTA
data.description: The Pentavalent (PENTA) vaccine aka 'DPT-HepB-Hib' is a five-in-one vaccine that protects children against Diphtheria, Pertusis (Whooping Cough), Tetanus, Hepatitis B and Haemophilus Influenza (type B).

data.name: POLIO
data.description: The POLIO vaccine protects children against Polio.

data.name: MEASLES
data.description: The MEASLES vaccine protects children against Measles.
